pages.text: walanudhiqannahum mina l-ʿadhabi l-adna duna l-ʿadhabi l-akbari laʿallahum yarjiʿuna
waman azlamu mimman dhukkira biayati rabbihi thumma aʿrada ʿanha inna mina l-muj'rimina muntaqimuna
walaqad atayna musa l-kitaba fala takun fi mir'yatin min liqaihi wajaʿalnahu hudan libani is'raila
wajaʿalna min'hum a-immatan yahduna bi-amrina lamma sabaru wakanu biayatina yuqinuna
inna rabbaka huwa yafsilu baynahum yawma l-qiyamati fima kanu fihi yakhtalifuna
awalam yahdi lahum kam ahlakna min qablihim mina l-quruni yamshuna fi masakinihim inna fi dhalika laayatin afala yasmaʿuna
awalam yaraw anna nasuqu l-maa ila l-ardi l-juruzi fanukh'riju bihi zarʿan takulu min'hu anʿamuhum wa-anfusuhum afala yub'siruna
wayaquluna mata hadha l-fathu in kuntum sadiqina
qul yawma l-fathi la yanfaʿu alladhina kafaru imanuhum wala hum yunzaruna
